{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Gateway |model=WBR-100 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/27/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MXF-R920815 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88W8500 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8500 |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8000 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:E0:B8 |oui_eth=00:E0:B8 |default_ch= }} ''Gateway Wireless Broadband Router''
[http://support.gateway.com/s/NETWORK/7004810/7004810nv.shtml Support page]
[http://support.gateway.com/s/Manuals/Desktops/8509439.pdf Manual] This device is a '''Gemtek''' WRTM-106B.. but the board clearly indicates '''SerComm''' design or manufacture. :"4900LZ00D" and "MADE IN TAIWAN" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The default SSID is probably '''Gateway'''. ==Images== [[File:Gateway WBR-100.jpg]] [[Has images::external| ]]
